ygData.subject: Re: Bossy Lady Hawk.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawk was shocked, nobody ever had the nerve to speak to her in such a tone. They did answer one of the three questions though, the Alliance was thier

Lady Hawk was shocked, nobody ever had the nerve to speak to her in 
such a tone. They did answer one of the three questions though, the 
Alliance was thier faction, now to have the other two answered.

"You dare to speak to me that way? I am Lady Hawk, and you should 
show me more respect." She hadn't been around many of her kind before 
and didn't know all the forms of ediquette on this planet. She didn't 
know how these bots treated visitors of higher stature and decided 
not to find out. "I have come to you with my weapons at my side, my 
arms in front of me and in a defensive form, I have no aggresive 
tendandcies toward you or this Alliance you speak of, I aske three 
things of you, it would seem courteous of you to answer at least one 
intentionally before asking the same of me." The female bot was 
unsure of herself but her father had taught her that one rule of 
diplomacy was to stay level headed, especially in anothers home.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer laughs at Lady Hawk's request. He figured that she 
wouldn't 
> put up much of a fight, but there was no reason to be sorry later. 
> DevilDuer keeps his gun ready, his other hand near his comm-link, 
> ready to call for back-up if neccessary.
> 
> "You're in no position to be making demands here," he yells loudly 
> enough for her to hear, "This is Alliance territory, I can have 5
> bots 
> down on ya in seconds. Introduce yourself first."
